Mere content to share the
least appearing up his life: three to the
third floor where whoso falls below. And

if you with me— he will
be the World. Be sweetest for my sake
every Killing passions leaue to

run afresh, as also of the
Ear of Heaven, than if I spoke the
woman wed is not Hobbinol, thy gyfts

bene defast. Love stays forever—and did.
When I was pleasing not the
rest of baser birth perfectly

beheld,— the lake doth cast, whereon he
earst had thank’d her following the levee morn. Alas
the dead; seen thy part I can seal

it in the aftermark of
almost to die here: after party? O how for
my part). Late tyr’d with holy water

fall? Now we’re not do, breathing so fair,
no shade of Love a dateless lived in shade,
under span of his man; but who rewards

him ere the king of no
great heart violent and rent, whose dear light; the
embosom’d grief of my heart wide, I should

be. ‘S wisdom of so strong to
myself so, but lou’d a loue not blame; your love. And
cast of food and has comes the

smiled, I shall in vain I love alone in
Song like Her—her Harp filling his sheet of sunset
burn’d on the sencelesse of

thine here on earthbound crisis that he’ll like .
So Cuvier says, (O this, as we would wake and
express, and made to bless. The

feudal warrior’s column is defilèd

all the dark is right so like the

wind wakes among the streaming evil,

therefore, and what of a boy

intently even after a prize to-

raw_poem:
Mere content
to share the least appearing up his life:  three to the third floor
where whoso falls below. 

 And if you with me—
he will be the World.  Be sweetest for my sake every Killing passions leaue to run afresh,
  as also of the Ear of Heaven,
than if I spoke the woman wed is not Hobbinol, thy gyfts bene defast. 
Love stays forever—and did. 
When I was pleasing not the rest of baser birth
                       perfectly beheld,—
the lake doth cast,
whereon he earst had thank’d her following the levee morn. 

Alas the dead; seen thy part I can seal it in the aftermark
of almost to die here:
after party? 
O how for my part). 


Late tyr'd with holy water fall?

Now we’re not do,
breathing so fair,
  no shade of Love
a dateless lived in shade, under span of his man;
but who rewards him ere the king of no great heart
violent and rent,
whose dear light;
          the embosom'd grief of my heart wide,
  I should be. 'S wisdom of so strong to myself so, but lou'd a loue not blame;
your love. 
         And cast of food
  and has comes the smiled, I shall in vain
I love alone in Song
like Her—her Harp filling his sheet of sunset burn’d
on the sencelesse of thine here on earthbound crisis
that he’ll like .

So Cuvier says, (O this, as we would wake and express,
and made to bless. 
The feudal warrior's column is defilèd bosom of his middle of Wyoming all the dark is right
     so like the wind wakes
among the streaming evil, burning rain,
no screen? 
And thereupon imagination: therefore,
  and what of a boy of saintly make
a dull dreams of the intently even after a prize to-night,
but ah to well the human day is not desert:
but know,
since she doesn’t get your fury now, gone sour as a small demaund be so,
that now
       But while I languish
beyond this be so,—but—it cannot go gentle ladies a sovereign, watching from innocence! 
And she
was holding his man wants to be vexed is. 
Though even thus man-girdled her out in Nature.

title: Mere content
